home.hero.title: Real experiences guided by locals who care.
home.hero.description: Reliable journeys, real people, and unforgettable moments ready for any corner of the world.
header.currency.label: Currency
header.language.label: Language
home.section.whatWeDo.label: What we do
home.section.whatWeDo.title: We make travel easy
home.section.whatWeDo.description: We select authentic tours, vet suppliers, and provide human support before, during, and after every trip.
home.benefits.support.title: Immediate local support
home.benefits.support.description: Teams and operators in every destination resolve issues without delays.
home.benefits.allies.title: Verified partners
home.benefits.allies.description: Partners audited by Proactivitis keep your journey in trusted hands.
home.benefits.flexible.title: Flexible experiences
home.benefits.flexible.description: Changes or cancellations for selected tours with no unnecessary paperwork.
home.section.recommended.label: Recommended
home.section.recommended.title: Most popular tours
home.longform.title: Plan tours and transfers with clear information
home.longform.body1: Proactivitis brings verified tours and private transfers together so you can compare real options, check availability, and book with confidence. Every experience includes schedule, location, and policy details to avoid surprises.
home.longform.body2: Our approach is simple: make decisions easier with useful context. We curate local partners, verify service standards, and keep a support team ready before, during, and after your trip.
home.longform.body3: Whether you are visiting for the first time or returning to a favorite destination, you will find recommended routes, highlighted experiences, and transfers ready to book from the airport or your hotel.
home.longform.points.1.title: Local coverage
home.longform.points.1.body: Tours in key destinations with verified providers and quality control.
home.longform.points.2.title: Human support
home.longform.points.2.body: Assistance in your language for changes, questions, and confirmations.
home.longform.points.3.title: Secure booking
home.longform.points.3.body: Protected payments and clear confirmation for every experience.
home.section.about.label: Why Proactivitis
home.section.about.title: Travel designed by real people
home.section.about.description: We combine local teams, technology, and reliable processes so every trip stays clear, human, and unforgettable.
tours.header.title: Curated Experiences: Discover the World Through a Local Lens
tours.header.description: Authentic tours, verified guides, and unforgettable moments. No automation here, only guaranteed quality.
tours.longform.title: Tours built for real travelers
tours.longform.body1: Find verified experiences with clear schedules, meeting points, and real support. Each tour includes practical details so you know what is included, how long it lasts, and how to get there.
tours.longform.body2: We prioritize local operators with proven track records and monitor service quality to keep every trip consistent.
tours.longform.body3: Compare options by category, duration, and destination. If you need help, our team can recommend the right tour for your plan and budget.
tours.filter.item.category: Category: quick selection with minimalist icons.
tours.filter.item.destination: Destination: smooth transitions without naming countries.
tours.features.instant: Instant Confirmation: Receive your voucher immediately.
tours.features.support: 24/7 Support: Real human assistance during your experience.
tours.no-results: No tours match those filters. Adjust the parameters and try again.
tours.destinations.label: Destinations in focus
tours.destinations.heading: Find your ideal zone
tours.destinations.description: Discover tours and experiences tied to this area.
tours.destinations.footer: Proactivitis carefully selects every tour operator to ensure your experience meets international safety and service standards. From private transfers to exclusive excursions, our platform is your guarantee of a hassle-free trip.
transfer.hero.label: Proactivitis Transfer
transfer.hero.title: Private transfers for any destination
transfer.hero.description: All-inclusive rides, bilingual drivers, and instant confirmation. From touchdown to your hotel lobby, your journey starts with confidence.
transfer.longform.title: Clear, safe transfers with real support
transfer.longform.body1: Choose origin and destination to see real fares, estimated times, and vehicle options. Every transfer includes instant confirmation and service tracking.
transfer.longform.body2: Our drivers are verified and know the most efficient routes to avoid delays. We also monitor flights to adjust pickup without hidden fees.
transfer.longform.body3: Traveling with family, a group, or extra luggage? Pick the right vehicle and reserve in minutes.
transfer.faq.label: Frequently Asked Questions
transfer.faq.heading: Everything you should know before traveling
transfer.faq.where.q: Where will the driver meet me?
transfer.faq.where.a: At the airport we escort you to arrivals with a Proactivitis sign and your name. At hotels, the meeting point is the main lobby.
transfer.faq.delay.q: What happens if my flight is delayed?
transfer.faq.delay.a: We monitor your flight number live and adjust the pickup time at no extra cost. You get a complimentary 60-minute wait window.
transfer.faq.cancel.a: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the service. Need to change the time? We handle it for you.
transfer.note: Proactivitis operates under a selective expansion model. We don't open destinations en masse; instead we manually validate each carrier and local guide so the Proactivitis standard stays intact across five continents.
destinations.label: Destinations
destinations.heading: Explore our destinations: A global network you can trust
destinations.description: We audit every destination to ensure your experience is flawless, from the Caribbean to Europe.
destinations.footer: Proactivitis operates under a selective expansion model. We don't open destinations en masse; instead we manually validate each carrier and local guide so the Proactivitis standard stays intact across five continents.
destinations.description.dominicanRepubl: White-sand beaches, nautical adventures, and colonial gems curated with care.
destinations.description.usa: Premium itineraries in Miami and New York with vetted local partners.
destinations.description.mexico: Riviera Maya experiences blending luxury and certified local culture.
destinations.description.europe: Handpicked European routes with expert guides and dependable logistics.
destinations.description.mideast: On-demand transfers and tours by invitation across the Arabian Peninsula.
destinations.note.verifying: Were verifying partners in this region.
tour.metadata.descriptionFallback: Explore tours curated by local experts with safety and care.

home.schema.description: Global travel platform: transfers and tours crafted for Clients, Travel Agencies, and Suppliers.
home.schema.faq.question.booking: How do I book tours and transfers on Proactivitis?
home.schema.faq.answer.booking: Book directly from our /tours or /traslado sections and receive confirmation within minutes.
home.schema.faq.question.agencies: Do you offer services for travel agencies?
home.schema.faq.answer.agencies: Yes, Proactivitis provides a global ecosystem for agencies and suppliers to manage their services professionally.

contact.hero.title: Direct professional support
contact.hero.description: Our team replies fast by email, WhatsApp Business, and phone 24/7. We're available around the clock so you can reach us from anywhere in the world.
contact.section.phone.label: Direct support line
contact.whatsapp.label: WhatsApp Business
contact.longform.title: Human support for tours, transfers, and bookings
contact.longform.body1: Our team handles tour questions, transfer requests, schedule changes, and post-booking support. We guide you to the best option based on your destination and travel style.
contact.longform.body2: If you are an agency or supplier, we also help with onboarding, payments, and operational validations so everything is clear from day one.
contact.longform.body3: Write to us with your name and request details. We reply quickly and keep real follow-up until it is resolved.

safetyGuide.meta.title: Safety Protocols and Transport Guide for Guests of {hotel}
safetyGuide.meta.description: Clear information on safety, transport licensing, and best practices for travelers staying at {hotel}.
safetyGuide.hero.label: Trusted guide
safetyGuide.hero.title: Safety Protocols and Transport Guide for Guests of {hotel}
safetyGuide.hero.body: This guide summarizes verified practices to move safely in Punta Cana and make informed decisions during your stay at {hotel}.
safetyGuide.section.license.title: Why transport licensing matters
safetyGuide.section.license.body: In the Dominican Republic, formal tourism services operate with Ministry of Tourism authorizations and active liability insurance. This documentation protects passengers and helps verify service traceability.
safetyGuide.section.license.bullets.1: Request the operator license or registration number.
safetyGuide.section.license.bullets.2: Ask for active insurance policy details and coverage scope.
safetyGuide.section.license.bullets.3: Confirm the vehicle and driver are properly identified.
safetyGuide.section.checklist.title: Checklist to avoid common scams
safetyGuide.section.checklist.bullets.1: Book only with formal confirmation and payment receipt.
safetyGuide.section.checklist.bullets.2: Verify the official meeting point and exact schedule.
safetyGuide.section.checklist.bullets.3: Avoid cash payments without a receipt or contract.
safetyGuide.section.checklist.bullets.4: Review ratings and available support channels.
safetyGuide.section.operator.title: How to identify a legal operator
safetyGuide.section.operator.legal.label: Legal operator
safetyGuide.section.operator.legal.bulle: Route and schedule confirmed in writing.
safetyGuide.section.operator.alert.label: Warning signs
safetyGuide.section.lost.title: Lost items: recommended protocol
safetyGuide.section.lost.steps.1: Report the loss at hotel reception and request a case number.
safetyGuide.section.lost.steps.2: Inform the tour provider with date, time, and item description.
safetyGuide.section.lost.steps.3: Keep vouchers or receipts to speed up verification.
safetyGuide.section.lost.body: Our Party Boat applies a cabin review protocol after each tour to prevent forgotten items before returning to {hotel}.
safetyGuide.section.cert.title: Certifications and traceability
safetyGuide.section.cert.body: Proactivitis operates with preventive GPS monitoring for passenger safety, route tracking, and schedule compliance. Traceability validates timing and supports any incident.
safetyGuide.section.cert.cards.gps.label: GPS Active
safetyGuide.section.pricing.title: Price transparency
safetyGuide.section.pricing.body: In Punta Cana, prices vary by distance, schedule, vehicle type, and season. To avoid overcharges, compare the following:
safetyGuide.section.pricing.legal.label: Registered service
safetyGuide.section.pricing.note: Tip: Always request a detailed breakdown to compare similar services.
safetyGuide.reco.label: Verified recommendations
safetyGuide.reco.title: Services with traceability and support
safetyGuide.reco.body: If you prefer a proven option with backing, here are safe alternatives that follow the same monitoring and documentation protocols.
safetyGuide.reco.tours.label: Recommended excursions
safetyGuide.reco.transfers.label: Recommended transfers
safetyGuide.reco.transfers.body: Private pickup with monitoring and support.
